Summary: Appeared to be a star but was moving.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of July the 3rd around 10 pm I decided to go out on my back deck and enjoy the country air. I live in Watertown TN in the country. There is nothing behind my house but field ,creek ,tree line and cows. I saw the brightest star I have ever seen so I was watching it then it moved . it moved alot straight up about 10 degrees then stopped. The star would rotate ,looked bigger and brighter on one side than the other you could tell it was spinning. I grabbed my camera and took pictures. I did not see it again until the 6th of july. This time I seen it just pull up to the tree line. I watched it for a few seconds than went and got my tripod this time and my camera. I seen another smaller looking star pull up to it then merge with the bigger one.It rises pretty fast in the sky. I stopped watching it about midnite. The next night it was there and I have not seen it anymore. My sister and son witnessed it also. I have video and still pictures if u would like to see them. It is in the eastern sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Watertown
This sighting has never been favorited.
